alert.note: Alert for Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 11 at 7:04PM EDT until further notice by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT...CHARLESTON...COLLETON AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 704 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jacksonboro to near Green Pond to near Yemassee, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Beaufort, Walterboro, Yemassee, Clarendon, Hollywood, Meggett, Gardens Corner, Jacksonboro, Ritter, Hendersonville, Green Pond, Laurel Bay, Dale, Sheldon, and Adams Run. This warning includes I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 45 and 54. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
